title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Former U.K. prime minister Theresa May on how declining trust is tied to economic malaise: ‘You have to be able to give young people hope for the future’
items.description: Democracy "depends on people having different views, but being able to respect that other people can have different views," May said at the Fortune MP...

items.title: Nike’s Jordan brand chairman hid his criminal past for 40 years. Now he wants CHROs to consider second chances
items.description: At age 16, Larry Miller was sent to a juvenile correction center for gang violence. He spent the next four decades concealing that secret.

items.title: Tesla brand damage revealed: Consumers rank its ethics and character near the very bottom of new Axios Harris poll
items.description: Even scandal-hit UnitedHealth Group and the UK oil company behind the Deepwater Horizon catastrophe are viewed in a better light.

items.title: Universal’s $7 billion Epic Universe theme park opens today. Here’s what to expect—and the best rides for families and daredevils
items.description: Park is likely to be one of the biggest pop culture events of the year.

items.title: Epic Universe, Florida’s newest major theme park in nearly three decades, is finally open—and Comcast executives are already thinking about expansion
items.description: Park is a big step up from its existing central-Florida projects.
